messages.content: Is `party` from `Thousands of security forces were out in the Russian capital and helicopters roamed the sky Wednesday, a show of force following protests over scandal-marred elections that saw Prime Minister Vladimir Putin's party struggle to keep a majority.` complex?

Is `held` from `Putin officially registered on Wednesday to run for the presidency in March, but the unusually sustained protests of the past two days showed the indignation of the Russian opposition and suggested his drive to retake the job he held from 2000-08 may not go as smoothly as expected.` complex?
Is `men` from `An amateur video posted online Sunday showed men carrying the dead body of a woman from a house.` complex?
Is `Samsung` from `Google defended itself saying it has no intentions of giving Motorola special treatment over other Android-running OEMs such as HTC, Samsung, and LG.` complex?
Is `Office` from `Tonya Thomas, 33, fatally shot her four children, who ranged in age from 12 to 17, said Lt. Tod Goodyear, a spokesman for the Brevard County Sheriff's Office.` complex?
Is `mother` from `A Florida mother shot her four children early Tuesday morning before turning the gun on herself at her home in Port St. John, police said.` complex?
Is `children` from `A witness described as a friend of Thomas' told police he received a text message from her indicating that she wanted to be cremated with her children.` complex?

Is `clearing` from `Google on Saturday said that Chinese regulators approved its $12.5 billion deal to buy Motorola Mobility, clearing the path for the Internet titan to complete the acquisition early next week.` complex?

Is `belongs` from `The area, a plain of farmland along the Orontes River, is dotted with villages of Christians, Sunni Muslims and Alawites, the offshoot sect of Shiite Islam to which Assad belongs.` complex?

Is `changed` from `Our stance since we agreed to acquire Motorola has not changed, and we look forward to closing the deal, Google spokeswoman Niki Fenwick said, confirming that the Chinese had approved the deal.` complex?
Is `middle` from `Another neighbor told deputies that Thomas sent a text message in the middle of the night saying she wanted to be cremated with her children.` complex?
Is `room` from `Because the government is strapped for cash, it has little room to help rescue the country's banks.` complex?
Is `city` from `About 200 were arrested at a similar attempt to hold an unsanctioned rally in St Petersburg and another 25 in the southern city of Rostov-on-Don.` complex?
Is `door` from `Authorities quickly moved in as emergency service breached the back door.` complex?
Is `Friday` from `The Spanish government is expected to approve a plan on Friday to force banks to place toxic real estate assets in holding companies that would later sell them off.` complex?
Is `power` from `He said it was ``inevitable'' because voters always are unhappy with the party in power.` complex?
Is `Ministry` from `The Interior Ministry said 17 other people were wounded, most Afghan children on their way to school.` complex?
Is `Hama` from `Speaking via Skype from Hama, activist Mousab Alhamadee said one local rebel leader was killed alongside five civilians.` complex?

Is `Assad` from `The area, a plain of farmland along the Orontes River, is dotted with villages of Christians, Sunni Muslims and Alawites, the offshoot sect of Shiite Islam to which Assad belongs.` complex?
Is `told` from `A witness described as a friend of Thomas' told police he received a text message from her indicating that she wanted to be cremated with her children.` complex?

Is `fears` from `Spain's banks were hit by billions of euros of losses after the bursting of a decade-long property bubble in 2008 and concerns about them, and the country's overspending regional governments, have fanned fears of a new euro zone debt crisis.` complex?
Is `crisis` from `As we emerge from a decade of conflict abroad and economic crisis at home, it is time to renew America, Obama said.` complex?

Is `shots` from `Brevard County Sheriff's deputies say Tanya Thomas shot and killed her four children who ranged in age from 12 to 17 A Florida mother who fatally shot her four children before killing herself Tuesday called three of the kids who had sought help from a neighbor back to the house before firing the fatal shots, authorities said.` complex?

Is `country` from `Spain's banks were hit by billions of euros of losses after the bursting of a decade-long property bubble in 2008 and concerns about them, and the country's overspending regional governments, have fanned fears of a new euro zone debt crisis.` complex?
Is `interested` from `Google is interested in purchasing Motorola mostly for its patents.` complex?

Is `Israel` from `It had also been the latest episode in worsening relations between Egypt and Israel since the killing of six Egyptian policemen on their common border as Israel hunted militants after a deadly attack.` complex?
Is `children` from `Tonya Thomas, 33, fatally shot her four children, who ranged in age from 12 to 17, said Lt. Tod Goodyear, a spokesman for the Brevard County Sheriff's Office.` complex?
Is `party` from `The pro-Kremlin United Russia party won less than 50 per cent of the vote, a steep fall from its earlier majority, according to preliminary results.` complex?
Is `walked` from `They turned around and walked back to the house," Goodyear said.` complex?

Is `banks` from `Fears that public finances might be overwhelmed by bailing out banks have led investors to consider Spain the next most likely European country to need an international bailout.` complex?
Is `Jaxs` from `Along with Pebbles Johnson, the young victims were identified as Joel Johnson, 12; Jazlin Johnson, 13; and Jaxs Johnson, 15.` complex?
Is `text` from `Another neighbor told deputies that Thomas sent a text message in the middle of the night saying she wanted to be cremated with her children.` complex?
Is `BBC` from `Fr Dolan told BBC Radio Ulster: "When Brenda was under attack, Lauren dived in to save her and in the process lost her own life.` complex?

Is `Commerce` from `Conditions put on the rubber stamp from China's Ministry of Commerce included Google keeping its Android software for gadgets such as smartphones and tablet computers free and open for at least five years.` complex?

Is `Wednesday` from `Putin officially registered on Wednesday to run for the presidency in March, but the unusually sustained protests of the past two days showed the indignation of the Russian opposition and suggested his drive to retake the job he held from 2000-08 may not go as smoothly as expected.` complex?
Is `percent` from `Preliminary results indicate the party won less than 50 percent of votes, a steep fall from its earlier majority.` complex?
Is `cover bad assets` from `The government has already forced banks to make provisions of 54bn euros to cover bad assets.` complex?
Is `bigger` from `The toxic assets now total 184 billion euros, but many fear the hole is even bigger.` complex?
Is `kids` from `This is a little bit different because they were older kids, Goodyear said.` complex?

Is `arrived` from `Sussex Police issued a statement this morning, saying: "The 22-year-old from Liverpool was arrested in the city yesterday on suspicion of murder   and arrived into custody in Sussex last night.` complex?

Is `dead` from `Fierce clashes between Syrian regime forces and armed rebels in the central city of Rastan on Monday left at least 23 soldiers dead and dozens wounded, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said.` complex?
Is `today` from `A PSNI spokesman said they were alerted to the shooting shortly before 10.40am today.` complex?

Is `fatally shot` from `Thirty-three-year-old Tonya Thomas fatally shot her four children, who ranged in age from 12 to 17, said Lt. Tod Goodyear, a spokesman for the Brevard County Sheriff's Office.` complex?
Is `friend` from `A witness described as a friend of Thomas' told police he received a text message from her indicating that she wanted to be cremated with her children.` complex?
Is `children` from `A Florida woman killed her four children at the family's home in Port St. John, Fla., on Tuesday before killing herself, the authorities said.` complex?

Is `back` from `Brevard County sheriff's investigators say a mother took the lives of her four children during an early morning confrontation, calling three of them back into her home to fatally shoot them before turning a gun on herself, law enforcement sources report.` complex?
Is `made` from `In September, officials from the Israeli embassy in Cairo made a short trip to Egypt to assess damage at the mission headquarters.` complex?
Is `front` from `Sheriff's deputies arrived on the scene at 4:54 a.m. to find 17-year-old Pebbles Johnson lying on the front lawn.` complex?
Is `real` from `The government is also expected to announce demands for the banks to set aside a further 35bn euros ($45bn) to cover sound loans in their real estate portfolios.` complex?
Is `Tonya` from `Deputies said the mother, identified as Tonya Thomas, 33, sent a warning text message to a friend before the shootings, but the friend didn't see the text until later.` complex?
Is `toxic` from `The toxic assets now total 184 billion euros, but many fear the hole is even bigger.` complex?

Is `statement` from `Sussex Police issued a statement this morning, saying: "The 22-year-old from Liverpool was arrested in the city yesterday on suspicion of murder   and arrived into custody in Sussex last night.` complex?
Is `offered` from `I spent some time with the family and offered our support and that of the wider community at this time.` complex?
Is `domestic incident` from `Jaxs Johnson was arrested in April for a domestic incident involving his mother, but details of the incident were not immediately known.` complex?

Is `security forces` from `Thousands of security forces were out in the Russian capital and helicopters roamed the sky Wednesday, a show of force following protests over scandal-marred elections that saw Prime Minister Vladimir Putin's party struggle to keep a majority.` complex?
Is `economic and security affairs` from `The pact envisions wide-ranging U.S. involvement in Afghan economic and security affairs for a decade, if only as an adviser or underwriter.` complex?
Is `front lawn` from `Sheriff's deputies arrived on the scene at 4:54 a.m. to find 17-year-old Pebbles Johnson lying on the front lawn.` complex?
Is `shortly` from `The neighbor gave one of them a towel for his injuries shortly before their mother came outside and called the children home.` complex?
Is `gunshots` from `They left, after which the neighbor heard more gunshots from inside the house and called 911, The Brevard Times reported.` complex?
Is `Interior` from `The Interior Ministry said 17 other people were wounded, most Afghan children on their way to school.` complex?
Is `dawn` from `Three of the children had gone to a neighbor's front door before dawn to say their mother had shot them.` complex?
Is `lenders` from `Spain is set to present new reforms to complete the clean-up of its banks after difficult last-minute talks between the government and lenders.` complex?
Is `authorities` from `A Florida woman killed her four children at the family's home in Port St. John, Fla., on Tuesday before killing herself, the authorities said.` complex?

Is `scheme` from `The text is being finalised after talks with the banks, a government source told the Reuters news agency, adding that both the new provisions and the "bad bank" scheme would be approved on Friday.` complex?

Is `stance` from `Our stance since we agreed to acquire Motorola has not changed, and we look forward to closing the deal, Google spokeswoman Niki Fenwick said, confirming that the Chinese had approved the deal.` complex?
Is `Successive waves` from `Successive waves of bank sector clean-ups have failed to convince investors.` complex?
Is `immediately` from `Jaxs Johnson was arrested in April for a domestic incident involving his mother, but details of the incident were not immediately known.` complex?

Is `finalised` from `The text is being finalised after talks with the banks, a government source told the Reuters news agency, adding that both the new provisions and the "bad bank" scheme would be approved on Friday.` complex?

Is `fatally` from `A Florida mother who fatally shot her four children before killing herself Tuesday called three of the kids who had sought help from a neighbor back to the house before firing the fatal shots, authorities said.` complex?
Is `incident` from `Jaxs Johnson was arrested in April for a domestic incident involving his mother, but details of the incident were not immediately known.` complex?

Is `resurgence` from `Obama's emphasis on a long-term U.S. commitment to Afghanistan reflects a lingering worry about the threat of a Taliban resurgence after 2014, when U.S. and NATO combat forces are scheduled to leave.` complex?

Is `solvent` from `A reform package for Spain's troubled banks, aimed at convincing investors that the sector is solvent and the country has a strategy to avoid a bailout, is expected to be released.` complex?
Is `foreclosed` from `The Bank of Spain estimates that Spanish banks are sitting on some 184 billion in 'problematic" assets, either loans or foreclosed property.` complex?

Is `offender` from `He added: 'At around 11.10am, a 26-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of murder and a 28-year-old male and 28-year-old female were arrested on suspicion of assisting an offender.` complex?

Is `enforcement` from `Brevard County sheriff's investigators say a mother took the lives of her four children during an early morning confrontation, calling three of them back into her home to fatally shoot them before turning a gun on herself, law enforcement sources report.` complex?
Is `unsanctioned` from `About 200 were arrested at a similar attempt to hold an unsanctioned rally in St Petersburg and another 25 in the southern city of Rostov-on-Don.` complex?
Is `reforms` from `Spain is set to present new reforms to complete the clean-up of its banks after difficult last-minute talks between the government and lenders.` complex?

Is `sustained` from `Meanwhile Mr Putin officially registered on to run for the presidency in March, but the unusually sustained protests of the past two days showed the indignation of the Russian opposition and suggested his drive to retake the job he held from 2000-2008 may not go as smoothly as expected.` complex?
Is `intentions` from `Google defended itself saying it has no intentions of giving Motorola special treatment over other Android-running OEMs such as HTC, Samsung, and LG.` complex?
Is `marred` from `Some opposition parties and international observers said the poll was marred by widespread reports and allegations of vote-rigging.` complex?

Is `bailout` from `A reform package for Spain's troubled banks, aimed at convincing investors that the sector is solvent and the country has a strategy to avoid a bailout, is expected to be released.` complex?

Is `tragically` from `Investigation: Police surround the scene of the shooting in County Derry, which happened on Saturday morning Martin McGuinness, Northern Ireland's deputy first minister and Mid-Ulster MP, said his heart went out to the family of the girl tragically killed.` complex?
Is `indication` from `The text is an indication that it was premeditated, Goodyear said.` complex?
Is `pledges` from `The agreement pledges ongoing U.S. support for Afghanistan after 88,000 U.S. combat forces leave.` complex?
Is `strapped` from `Because the government is strapped for cash, it has little room to help rescue the country's banks.` complex?

Is `indignation` from `Meanwhile Mr Putin officially registered on to run for the presidency in March, but the unusually sustained protests of the past two days showed the indignation of the Russian opposition and suggested his drive to retake the job he held from 2000-2008 may not go as smoothly as expected.` complex?
Is `underwriter` from `The pact envisions wide-ranging U.S. involvement in Afghan economic and security affairs for a decade, if only as an adviser or underwriter.` complex?

Is `suspicion` from `He added: 'At around 11.10am, a 26-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of murder and a 28-year-old male and 28-year-old female were arrested on suspicion of assisting an offender.` complex?
Is `surveillance` from `Two Chinese marine surveillance ships are in this area fulfilling the duties of safeguarding Chinese maritime rights and interests, it said in a statement.` complex?

Is `scandal-marred` from `Thousands of security forces were out in the Russian capital and helicopters roamed the sky Wednesday, a show of force following protests over scandal-marred elections that saw Prime Minister Vladimir Putin's party struggle to keep a majority.` complex?
